'Leo Michelis' is a Greek-Canadian economist. He is a Professor of Economics at
Ryerson University. He received his Ph.D. in Economics from Queen's University
and his B.A. and M.A. degrees from York University. His areas of research
interests are theoretical and applied econometrics and macro-monetary economics.
He has published, among others, in Canadian Journal of Economics, Journal of
Applied Econometrics, Journal of Econometrics and Journal of Economic Dynamics
and Control.
